page.title: 03A house on Harmers Hay
page.content: This house is a{bungalow.}It is new and it has a nice, shiny door. The family have two daughters who are often out{iceskating.}The house itself is extremely tidy with every book or magazine in the right place. The girls are fined 5p every time they leave their shoes or jumpers lying around. the mother, works in a hairdressers. The father,{works in a travel agency. {The other member of the family, a sister, who is physically handicapped, and lives with her family permanently. Their garden is fairly small and it is decorated with gnomes of all shapes and sizes. They also have two neat red rose bushes on either side of the garden. By Kate Armitage
